entry.title: WIND WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 04:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: SSW 42 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 20 this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
